p: In addition, health authorities were consulted to obtain outbreak data. Also, the archives of the Pan American Health Organization were examined, and epidemiological bulletins were investigated on the ministry of health websites of countries with a reported presence of Mayaro (Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Ecuador, French Guiana, Haiti, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, and Venezuela). Lastly, references listed in academic articles and health authority reports were manually examined to further identify MAYV data for this report.
